pkgmetadata.longdescription: Landscape Visualizations in R and 'Unity' // Functions for the retrieval, manipulation, and visualization of 'geospatial' data, with an aim towards producing '3D' landscape visualizations in the 'Unity' '3D' rendering engine. Functions are also provided for retrieving elevation data and base map tiles from the 'USGS' National Map https://apps.nationalmap.gov/services/.
